Class StudentController

Object
UserController
StudentController
public class StudentController extends UserController
controller class for student act as layer between user and services allow student to view internship, apply and withdraw from internship

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentController

      public StudentController(AuthenticationService auth, IRepository repo, RequestService request, InternshipService internshipService, ApplicationService applicationService, Student student)
      Constructs student controller bound to a specific student
      Parameters:
      auth - authentication service for login verification
      repo - shared repository for data persistence
      request - shared request service for handling requests
      internshipService - shared service for managing internships
      applicationService - shared service for managing applications
      student - the student representative associated with this controller

  • Method Details

    • launch

      public void launch(SystemController systemController)
      Launches the student UI interface after log in
      Parameters:
      systemController - shared controller class which allows student to navigate back to main menu

    • viewFilteredInternships

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> viewFilteredInternships(FilterCriteria filter)
      View all eligible internships with option to filter.
      Parameters:
      filter - FilterCriteria object for filtering the internships
      Returns:
      list of internships matching the filter criteria

    • applyInternship

      public void applyInternship(String internshipId) throws ObjectNotFoundException, MaxExceedException, UserNotFoundException, IllegalStateException
      Apply for an internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - Unique string id assigned to each Internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship ID is invalid
      IllegalStateException - if the internship has already been filled or the student is not eligible to apply
      ObjectNotFoundException
      MaxExceedException
      UserNotFoundException

    • acceptPlacement

      public void acceptPlacement(String applicationId) throws ObjectNotFoundException
      Accept an internship which has been offered to the student
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique string id assigned to each Application
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException

    • withdrawPlacement

      public void withdrawPlacement(String appId, String reason) throws IllegalArgumentException, SecurityException, ObjectNotFoundException, ObjectAlreadyExistsException
      Withdraw an application (can be pending/accepted)
      Parameters:
      appId - Unique string id assigned to each Application
      reason - Reason provided by student for withdrawing
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if inputs are not strings
      SecurityException - if the application has already been withdrawn
      ObjectNotFoundException - if the application id is invalid
      ObjectAlreadyExistsException - if there has been a previous exception

    • myApplications

      public List<Application> myApplications()
      Returns:
      List of applications by a specific student

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent()
      Returns:
      return student object

    • getStudentById

      public User getStudentById(String studentId)
      Parameters:
      studentId - student id
      Returns:
      find the related student object and return as User type

    • getInternshipById

      public InternshipOpportunity getInternshipById(String InternId)
      Parameters:
      InternId - internship Id
      Returns:
      the related internship object and return it
